Heating, Hot Water & Building Services
  • New plumbing system and pipe work installed throughout.
  • Three external Daikin Altherma Air to Water Heat Pumps provide environmentally friendly and cost effective energy to power the entire heating, hot water and air heating & cooling.
  • Roof mounted solar panels installed at main roof level.
  • 600 litre hot water storage in two tanks fitted with rapid recharge.
  • Low temperature hot water under floor heating to all principal rooms, bedrooms and Master Bathroom. Individual thermostatic control to each room.
  • Boosted cold water supply with hydro-pneumatic accumulator to maintain a constant 3 bar pressure.
  • Water softener.
  • Separate hot water circuit supplies chrome towel warmers to all bathrooms.
  • Electric under floor heating to secondary bathrooms.
  • Mechanical extract ventilation to all bath, cloak and laundry rooms.
  • New high capacity incoming gas, water and electrical utility supplies.
Air Heating & Cooling
  • Daikin Altherma Air to Water Heat Pumps provide air heating and cooling system throughout the house.
  • Advanced whole house controls and programmers with individual room controllers.
Security
  • Dedicated front door colour screen, video-entry system accessible throughout.
  • Additional CCTV surveillance cameras, recorded and viewable on screens. Linked to unique house web site if required.
  • Comprehensive intruder alarm (NACOSS/NSI standards) and whole building fire protection system installed, centrally monitored and maintained by ADT Fire & Security; RedCARE protected via dedicated incoming phone line.
  • Advanced dual technology security sensors simultaneously detect intruder heat and movement.
  • Separate alarm isolation zones and supplementary infra-red personal attack transmitters.
Crestron Home Network
  • Crestron Home Networks software integrates and controls all of the home technology to include multiroom audio and visual distribution, security, window blinds and lighting automation.
  • Wall mounted 12 button keypads located in every room provide complete control of all possible media devices including TV, satellite, DVD and iPod hard-drives. • In addition to keypads, the entire system is controlled via a wireless Crestron colour touch screen. Further control screens and wireless devices can be added to suit personal requirements. Secondary bedroom ipod screens.
Lutron Lighting, Blinds
  • Lutron HomeWorks software allows the interior and exterior lighting to be programmed to suit scene setting and security requirements throughout.
  • Lutron software incorporates the control of all electric window blinds and is fully integrated with the Crestron home network.
  • Electronically controlled blinds installed to all principal rooms.
Components
  • Electronic components are centrally located in a dedicated storage rack within the Entertainment Space; equipment includes digital tuner, satellite Sky High Definition Digi box, CD and Blu-ray DVD player.
  • 3 metre wide, ceiling mounted drop down ‘cinema’ style screen, projector and surround sound within the Entertainment Space. Additional wall mounted 60” plasma screen.
  • An iPod docking station is installed within the Entertainment Space that allows music to be accessed anywhere in the house. The iPod hard-drive and interface is accessed from the Crestron wall mounted keypads and colour touch screen; further docking stations can be installed within individual rooms.
  • Speakers located in bedrooms and bathrooms.
Cabling
  • New electrical and Cat5 cabling installed through out the house.
  • Telephone and multiple communication points in all rooms wired to a central hub to allow for a computer network (LAN), wireless network and/or telephone exchange.
  • Cabling installed in all principal rooms for additional local audio visual distribution (satellite, TV, DVD, CD, iPod).
  • High speed ADSL and multicapacity telephone lines installed.
